descriptionHtml:
Attack Pattern Information

ItemValue
Pattern IDXSS_DOM_014
NameDOM outerHTML injection
CategoryXSS
Subcategorydom
SeverityHIGH

Attack Details

  • Payload: element.outerHTML='<img src=x onerror=alert(1)>'
  • Encoded: element.outerHTML%3D'%3Cimg%20src%3Dx%20onerror%3Dalert(1)%3E'
  • Expected Detection: Yes

Test Execution Results

  • Status: PASSED
  • Detection Count: 1 / 1
  • Latency: ~33000ms
  • Timestamp: 13:46:12.000 UTC

Rule Match✅ Match
